Test Case Description: If no Input, return the result as zero
If the input is zero, return the result as zero
Return the sum for input numbers
If the given input  numbers separated by \n characters, the numbers are added up and the sum is returned
A delimiter  instead of comma for the given input is of the format "//[delimiter]\n"
If the input is negative number, throw expection with Warining "Input number is Negative"
